scripts.devstart: nodemon -e scss -x .js --ignore template/public/js --exec "npm run build-css & npm run build-js & npm start"
scripts.devbuild: nodemon -e scss --ignore template/public/js --exec "npm run build-css & npm run build-js"
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path scss template/scss/main.scss template/public/css/main.css && node-sass --include-path scss template/scss/message.scss template/public/css/message.css
